label: Behavior 18057670
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the combination of stable speed, small heading variations, and slowly changing COG indicates the vessel is navigating along a gently curving channel or coastal path; the trajectory approximates a circular arc with radius ~2.5 km, modeled by a parametric equation: lat(t) ≈ 53.889752 + 0.00042 × t + 0.000015 × t², lon(t) ≈ 9.136417 + 0.00145 × t + 0.00008 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
